item.title: Movavi Video Editor Expert - Upwork
item.description:
Hi there,

I am looking for a Movavi Video Editor expert to give the instructions on how to create a progress bar with percentages.

It's for the fitness video channel so we want to implement the progress bar (with percentages) during the workout.

I am not looking for a video editor to work on our videos, we are looking for advice on how to create this feature.

Step by step - $50 USD in total.

Please only serious applicants with experience.

B

item.title: Product Review Video Creator (Amazon Video) - Upwork
item.description:
Hi! I am Lradon from Andvids.We are a video production agency from China assisting our clients in finding  content creators to produce unboxing videos. You can not only get free products(beauty,household,outdoor products,children's and pets' toys etc.), but also commissions by doing this in your free time.

Here are some requirements for the shoot:
1. The length of the video is 1-3 minutes, of which 30% of the time is used for explanation, and 70% of the time is used to show the use scenario of the product
2. Shoot in landscape mode (16:9) ，your face need to be shown in video
3. A clean, bright shooting environment
4. Able to introduce products in fluent and clear English
5. Introduce the selling points and functions of the product, and use it in multiple scenarios.
6. Don't mention price, discount
7. In case of emergency, illness, move or vacation, please inform us in advance.
Do not show QR codes of packaging or products in the video, and do not mention personal information

About project time and delivery method
Please complete the shooting and edit within three days after receiving the product.
And name the video in this format: order number + product name + your name, and put the video Upload it to Google Drive, set the link permission to open and send it to me.
I will pay you after I review it.

Most importantly, we need the original video.
About copyright: After you agree to send the video to us, we have the right to use your likeness for promotional purposes, including but not limited to uploading the video to Amazon

Special case treatment：
  However, if you cannot complete the shooting on time after receiving the product, lose contact, do not shoot, you will be responsible for this, the solution is as follows (choose one):
1. Pay for the product.
2. Forward the product to the new address and bear the shipping cost.

Long-term cooperation：
  The first three videos are the experimental list.Of course I'll still give you a commission.
   After that, if the video effect is good and the communication between the two parties is smooth, long-term cooperation can be considered.

If you are interested in this job,feel free to contact me and please send me an introduction video or anything you have shot recently.Look forward to receiving your applications.Thank you!


Budget: $10
Posted On: June 15, 2024 10:06 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Production
Skills: Video Production
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: China
click to apply

item.title: Dashcam Video Reordering project - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking enthusiastic individuals from around the world to join our project as Dashcam Video Recorders. The task involves recording high-resolution videos using a car dashcam while driving in various locations within your country. This is a great opportunity for anyone who enjoys driving and wants to earn extra income by simply recording their journeys.
Responsibilities:
Record high-quality, high-resolution videos using a car dashcam.
Ensure the videos are clear, stable, and provide a good view of the surroundings.
Capture videos in different locations within your country, including urban areas, highways, and rural roads.
Submit the recorded videos as per the guidelines provided.
Requirements:
Access to a car equipped with a high-resolution dashcam.
Ability to record videos in different parts of your country.
Attention to detail to ensure video quality meets the required standards.
Reliable internet connection to upload the recorded videos.
Payment:
The rate for this task is $2 per hour of recorded video.
Payments will be made upon the successful submission and verification of the videos.
How to Apply:
If you are interested in this opportunity, please submit your application with the following details:
Your name and contact information.
The make and model of your dashcam.
The regions or cities where you can record videos.
Any previous experience with similar tasks (not mandatory).
Join us in this exciting project and get paid to explore your surroundings while helping us collect valuable data from different parts of the world!

Budget: $10
Posted On: June 15, 2024 10:03 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Car
Skills: Car
Country: India
click to apply

item.title: UGC videos for product video ads (girls) - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a UGC content creator to produce high-quality video ads (each of under 60 seconds) for 4 products in the skin care and wellness industry. Products like face serum, face mask, breast oil, Weight gainer, libido booster,  bum and back cream. As a content creator, you will be responsible for conceptualizing, shooting, editing, and delivering engaging video content that highlights the benefits and features of our products. This role requires a strong understanding of UGC trends and the ability to create content that resonates with our target audience.

    Key skills:
    - Video production
    - Video editing
    - Storyboarding
    - Content ideation
    - Creative direction
    - Knowledge of skin care and wellness industry

    Time frame: Under 60 Second


Budget: $50
Posted On: June 15, 2024 09:50 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Short Video Ad, Video Production, Video Commercial, Video Advertising, Video Ad, Product Ad Campaign
Skills: Short Video Ad, Video Production, Video Commercial, Video Advertising, Video Ad, Product Ad Campaign
Country: India
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for Geopolitics - Upwork
item.description:
I'm looking for an editor who is able to create explainer videos on geopolitics.

*The budget will be $30/video, but we want the videos quick and fast, so you can earn up to $500 within the month.

Here is a reference video:
https://youtu.be/R6P5A_OBa6o

You must be able to:
- source high quality clips and interviews
- work with a given script and voiceover
- attention to detail in selecting clips that best suit the part of the script
- weave in interviews and soundbites to enhance the story
- create simple graphics similar to the reference video.
- edit music properly to create a flow

If you have read through the post, please indicate your favourite animated video/ad/film. (we will ignore anyone who does not include this)

NOTE:
- No agencies.
- We go by a project cost instead of hourly cost.
- Please indicate if you have a revision limit.
- Please also include in your post if there's anything else you need to inform us (e.g. commitments, work time, etc.)

Budget: $500
Posted On: June 15, 2024 09:32 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing
Country: Singapore
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for a video editor to join me as a team member. You must be a freelancer / editor NOT a agency.

What am i looking for?

I need someone who is talented in producing short form content such as tiktoks and creating interesting advertisements with footage provided.

Most of the content you edit and create will be for instagram and youtube.

You must be able to understand English to a good level

I will show some examples of the type of work below, please let me know if you can do all this type of editing. If you can't, do not be disheartened. Please just let me know in your proposal your skill level currently.

I don't care what programs you use as long as you can do the work whilst knowing how to maintain quality control and safety in terms of copyright.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Eq6hoHywaM4
https://www.youtube.com/shorts/Lvo3XKztMKI


Hourly Range: $10.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 15, 2024 09:19 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:360-Degree Video Editing, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Production, Video Commercial, Education, Explainer Video, Testimonial Video
Skills: 360-Degree Video Editing, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Production, Video Commercial, Education, Explainer Video, Testimonial Video
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: UGC Video For Women 45+ Focused Weight Loss Product - Upwork
item.description:
We're selling a weight loss supplement that's focused on helping women lose weight during menopause. The supplement is supposed to boost serotonin levels and work as a hunger suppressant (like a natural Ozempic).

We have a script and a concept that we want to film already similar to this video that we will replicate: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1ngKf4-xQWXdnNZ-SW_o6J7bry33wS10Q/view?usp=sharing

The purpose of this ad isn't to sell the product directly, instead, get viewers to complete a quick 1-minute survey.  

If you're interested, please apply!

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 15, 2024 09:14 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:UGC, Testimonial Video, Video Production, Videography, Explainer Video, Video Commercial
Skills: UGC, Testimonial Video, Video Production, Videography, Explainer Video, Video Commercial

Country: United States
